subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: In the first tangible evidence of a one-year-old alliance between Major League Soccer and the German Bundesliga, Borussia Mönchengladbach will train for 10 days in the United States this summer and plans to play matches against the Colorado Rapids and F.C. Dallas.
snippet: In the first tangible evidence of a one-year-old alliance between Major League Soccer and the German Bundesliga, Borussia Mönchengladbach will train for 10 days in the United States this summer and plans to play matches against the Colorado Rapids...
